unit.creator: Philodemus || Avdoulou, Eleni
unit.title: Index Pythagoreorum || Fr. 62 PHerc. 1508 || Diplomatic Apparatus

dsl.content: 4 []ε[ inf. vest. et dext. sup. horiz., (β, ρ), sin. inf. vest. 5 ]λ dext. sup. horiz. et dext. sup. vert. 6 ζ[ sin. vert. vel arcus, sin. inf. asc., (κ, χ) 7 ]οϲ[ (ε, ξ), (λ, δ, α), (φ, ρ), med. horiz. (fort. superpos.), vest. 8 ε̣[ sin. sup. vest. 9 η[ sup. vert., vert. 10 ]ο[ sin. sup. asc. et dext. inf. vest. (fort. suppos.), vert., (ι, τ), sin. inf. arcus, inf. fort. arcus, inf. horiz. 11 ]ι̣ (π, τ) 12 ]κευ[ dext. desc. vel vert., (ο, α), inf. vest. 14 ]ϲ[ med. vest. (fort. superpos.), sup. vert., inf. horiz. et med. horiz et sup. vest., sin. inf. vert. et sup. vest.
